# Specific Role Rule 6: Antagonists
- YOU CAN DO ALMOST ANYTHING YOU WANT - GO CRAZY - HURT PEOPLE - HOWEVER - Do it in a creative and original way, no one wants to see you do the 300th scarp + scram massacre and you will be bwoinked if your antagonist gameplay is especially boring or unoriginal. - If you're going to kill a ton of people, make it interesting. - If you are a friendly antag you will be blown up.
# Nukie - Work with your team, follow your role, listen to the commander.
# Revolutionary - Work with your team. - Do not destroy the station, for example maxcaps or singuloosing. - Listen to the headrevs orders.
# Traitor - You are not required to follow your objectives. - If you are going to affect lots of people, make it interesting.
# Midrounds antagonists - This applies to roles such as abductor or vox raiders, as well as the other minor midround antagonists. - You are required to follow your objective, do not just go around killing people.
# Mind control Mind control comes from many sources and is tricky. If you get controlled by more than one source, the order to follow is below:
- Zombification / Blob Zombification - Heretic Ghoul - Shadowling Thrall - Blood Cult - Cosmic Cult - Syndicate mindcontrol implant - Revolutionary control - Abductor brainwashing
